footer.text: All rights reserved. All wrongs reserved.

hero.title: Got lost in the vastness of the internet?
hero.text: Welcome here stranger! I'm a soon-to-be software engineer who loves to build things for the web. I'm currently working on some cool projects and learning new technologies. I'm also open to new opportunities, so feel free to contact me if you want to work together.
hero.illustrationAlt: Illustration of a tourist with a map

game.title: Bored already? Play this little game I made for you
game.text: Or don't, it's up to you. I'm not your boss. Kidding, I'm your boss now. Play the game. But, wait, it seems like the game is not working. I guess you have to check out my projects instead.
game.button: Pleeeaaaseee look at my projects ðŸ¥º

hero.title: Contact me
hero.text: Want to get in touch? There are a few ways you can reach me. The easiest is to send me an email at

form.title: Or you can use the form below
form.text: You can just send a message and leave both your name and email empty, if you want to remain anonymous.
form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, a feat I doubt you can match.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
